A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Story is not original. Johnson just mixed Empire Strikes Back and The Return of the Jedi. I found it predictable and drags with its side stories.\nBenicio del Toro and Gwendoline Christie were under used.\nThe light sabre fights were horrible. The Prequels stand as the best light sabre choreography and best original stories compared to these last 2 SW entries in to the space saga.
